entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
